WHAT THIS IS
================================================================================

Haven Mobile Explorer is a Progressive Web App (PWA) that works on ALL phones:
‚úÖ iPhone & iPad (iOS 14+)
‚úÖ Android phones & tablets
‚úÖ Any modern mobile browser

It's a SINGLE HTML FILE that includes:
- System Entry Wizard (add/edit systems)
- 3D Map Generator & Viewer
- Activity Logs
- JSON Export/Import
- Photo support (camera or gallery)
- Works 100% OFFLINE after first load

NO app store needed!
NO installation required (but recommended)!
Just open the HTML file and go!

DETAILED FEATURES
================================================================================

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ADDING A SYSTEM (WIZARD TAB)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

REQUIRED FIELDS:
‚úì System Name - e.g., "ALPHA-7432"
‚úì Region - Select from dropdown
‚úì X, Y, Z Coordinates - Numbers (can use decimals)

OPTIONAL FIELDS:
‚Ä¢ Planets - Comma-separated list (e.g., "Planet A, Planet B, Planet C")
‚Ä¢ Fauna Level - None, Low, Medium, High
‚Ä¢ Flora Level - None, Low, Medium, High
‚Ä¢ Sentinel Level - None, Low, Medium, High, Aggressive
‚Ä¢ Materials - Resources found (e.g., "Carbon, Ferrite, Gold")
‚Ä¢ Base Location - Where you built a base
‚Ä¢ Notes - Any additional information
‚Ä¢ Photo - Tap photo area to add from camera/gallery

PHOTO TIPS:
- Max size: 2MB per photo (app will warn if larger)
- Photos stored as base64 in the JSON file
- Recommended: Use phone camera in landscape mode
- Keep photos under 1MB for best performance

AFTER SAVING:
- System appears in "Saved Systems" list below
- System count updates at top
- Form clears (ready for next system)
- Green "Saved!" confirmation shows

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
EXPORT & IMPORT
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

EXPORT DATA:
1. Go to Export Tab (üì§)
2. See total system count
3. Tap "Export JSON File"
4. File downloads to your phone (Downloads folder)
5. Filename: haven_data_[timestamp].json

FILE FORMAT:
{
  "_meta": {
    "version": "1.0.0",
    "exported_at": "2025-11-06T...",
    "device": "Mobile Explorer",
    "system_count": 15
  },
  "SYSTEM_NAME": {
    "id": "...",
    "name": "SYSTEM_NAME",
    "x": 1.5,
    "y": -2.3,
    "z": 0.8,
    ...
  }
}

IMPORT DATA:
1. Tap "Import JSON File"
2. Select JSON file from your phone
3. Confirms system count
4. Replaces current data (warns first!)
5. Systems load into list

SEND TO MISSION CONTROL:
1. Export JSON
2. Find file in Downloads
3. Share via:
   - Email as attachment
   - Upload to cloud drive
   - AirDrop (iOS)
   - Messaging app

CLEAR ALL DATA:
- Tap "Clear All Data" (red button)
- TWO confirmations required
- Deletes all systems and logs
- Cannot be undone!

================================================================================
DATA STORAGE & LIMITS
================================================================================

WHERE DATA IS STORED:
- Browser localStorage (up to 10MB typically)
- Photos stored as base64 (embedded in data)
- Completely private (never leaves your device)

RECOMMENDED LIMITS:
‚úì Systems: 50-200 per file (you set limit at 200)
‚úì Photos: Under 1MB each (max 2MB enforced)
‚úì Total data size: Under 5MB for best performance

IF APPROACHING LIMITS:
1. Export current data
2. Clear all data in app
3. Start fresh file
4. Export again when needed
5. Send multiple JSON files to mission control

================================================================================
TROUBLESHOOTING
================================================================================

APP WON'T OPEN:
- Try refreshing the page
- Clear browser cache
- Redownload HTML file
- Make sure browser is updated

CAN'T SAVE SYSTEMS:
- Check required fields (name, region, x/y/z)
- Make sure coordinates are numbers
- Try clearing form and re-entering

MAP WON'T RENDER:
- Wait for page to fully load
- Check if you have systems added
- Tap "Regenerate Map"
- Try refreshing the page

PHOTOS WON'T UPLOAD:
- Check photo size (max 2MB)
- Try a smaller photo
- Make sure camera permission granted
- Try from gallery instead of camera

EXPORT NOT WORKING:
- Check browser downloads folder
- Look for haven_data_[numbers].json
- Try different browser
- Make sure storage isn't full

DATA DISAPPEARED:
- Check if in different browser
- If you cleared browser data, it's gone
- Always export as backup!
- Cannot recover without export

OUT OF STORAGE:
- Export and backup your data
- Clear all data in app
- Start fresh
- Browser storage limits vary

================================================================================
TECHNICAL DETAILS
================================================================================

Technology Stack:
- HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6+)
- Three.js r128 for 3D rendering
- LocalStorage API for data persistence
- FileReader API for imports
- Blob API for exports
- MediaDevices API for camera

Browser Requirements:
- iOS Safari 14.0+
- Chrome 90+
- Firefox 88+
- Edge 90+
- Samsung Internet 14+

File Size:
- HTML file: ~50KB
- With Three.js: ~250KB after first load
- Storage used: Varies with data (check Export tab)

Privacy:
‚úÖ No internet connection after first load
‚úÖ No data sent to servers
‚úÖ No tracking or analytics
‚úÖ Everything stored locally on YOUR device
‚úÖ Only you can access your data
